actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The cloud giant makes three Cloud-Coated Mace attacks, or it makes two Wind Burst attacks.

actions.name: Cloud-Coated Mace
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 18 (3d6+8) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) cold damage.

actions.name: Wind Burst
actions.desc: _Ranged Spell Attack:_ +8 to hit, range 150 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 31 (5d10+4) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 16 STR save or be pushed up to 10 feet away from the cloud giant and knocked prone.

bonus_actions.name: Cloud Cover
bonus_actions.desc: The cloud giant creates a 20-foot cube of clouds centered on a point it can see within 60 feet of it. The cube spreads around corners, and its area is heavily obscured. The cloud lasts for 1 minute, until the cloud giant dies, or until the cloud giant uses this bonus action again.

bonus_actions.name: Condense
bonus_actions.desc: The cloud giant causes a 20-foot-radius sphere of cloud, fog, smoke, or steam centered on a point it can see within 60 feet of it to become as thick as mud, making the area difficult terrain for creatures moving through it. A creature that starts its turn in the hardened cloud must succeed on a DC 15 STR save or be restrained until the start of its next turn. The cloud remains condensed for 1 minute, until the cloud giant dies, or until the cloud giant uses this bonus action again.

reactions.name: Cirrus Deflection
reactions.desc: The cloud giant creates a bit of hardened cloud between it and an attacker, increasing the giant's AC by 4. To do so, it must be able to see the attacker.

special_abilities.name: Cloudsight
special_abilities.desc: The cloud giant can see through areas obscured by clouds, fog, smoke, and steam without penalty.

special_abilities.name: Giant Attributes
special_abilities.desc: The cloud giant is resistant to the stunned condition, and it is vulnerable to the prone condition.

special_abilities.name: Heightened Smell
special_abilities.desc: The cloud giant's Perception is 22 when perceiving by smell.
